repo.name: BIOSIMET / CNET
repo.description: A web browser-based access system that allows company administrators to review clock in/out records, attendance reports, work schedules, geolocation marks, and a list of collaborators.

about.ab: Development of web solutions in .NET Framework, covering both the Back End and Front End through MVC architectures.
Page layout using HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript.
Integration and utilization of the Here API to optimize functionalities and enhance user experience in interactive map usage.
Management and maintenance of the MySQL database, ensuring data integrity and efficiency.

repo.name: Reporte de Averías / OIJ
repo.description: Specialized system for efficient management of breakdown reports within a company, adapted for different user roles. This system enables work teams to generate, administer, and track reports in a personalized manner.

about.ab: Development of web applications using Front-End technologies such as Angular and Back-End technologies like .NET Framework.
Maintenance and management of a database through SQL queries.
Page layout using HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript to ensure a user-friendly interface.
Gathering requirements from clients to understand their needs and specifications.
Analysis of requirements and design of the solution to meet client needs.
Worked using the Scrum methodology.

repo.name: HOTEL COCOMILK CLIENTE
repo.description: Customized room reservation system for hotels, making it easy for customers to efficiently book rooms.

about.ab: Development of web applications using Front-End technologies such as Angular and Back-End technologies like .NET Framework.Development of web applications using Front-End technologies like Angular and Back-End technologies like .NET Framework.
Page layout using HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript.
Maintenance and management of a database through PostgreSQL.
Utilization of the RUP methodology.

repo.name: HOTEL COCOMILK ADMINISTRADOR
repo.description: Comprehensive system for hotel management, covering room management, reservations, customers, advertising, and more. This solution provides efficient and centralized control, enabling smooth operation.

about.ab: Development of web applications using Front-End technologies like Angular and Back-End technologies like .NET Framework.
Implementation of a Security module using .Net Framework.
Page layout using HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript.
Maintenance and management of a database through PostgreSQL.
Utilization of the RUP methodology.

repo.name: POKEDEX - IONIC
repo.description: System based on IONIC that leverages a free Pokémon API to efficiently manage related data.

about.ab: Front-end development using a mobile-centric approach with the IONIC framework.
Page layout using HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript.

repo.name: DATA
repo.description: Personal Project: Multimedia resource management application. Developed using Angular and Firebase.

about.ab: Development of web applications using Front-End technologies like Angular.
Data stored in Firebase databases
Using the Jikan API to Manipulate Anime-Related Data
Page layout using HTML5, CSS, and JavaScript.
